attributes.action: re-recognise the 15th September each year as Battle of Britain Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 15th September 1940 the RAF fought off two vicious assaults fron the German Air Force. Hitler realised that Britain could not be invaded whilst the RAF were around and turned his attention to Russia. We owe it to "The Few" and the 544 airman who perished during the Battle of Britain to restore the 15th Sept to hounour their sacrifice for our freedom.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "re-recognise the 15th September each year as Battle of Britain Day."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
